mean_cn: n. 妨碍，阻碍，障碍物，（言语）障碍，口吃
mean_en: something that makes it difficult to do or complete something :something that interferes with movement or progress
word_etyma: impedi阻碍 + ment名词后缀 → impediment 阻碍
sentence: He managed to easily overcome the impediment to progress offered by the rocky landscape.
sentence_trans: 他很轻松地克服了那个山石起伏造成的障碍。
